tidbits.title: Nature Island
tidbits.description: Dominica is known as the 'Nature Island of the Caribbean,' boasting lush rainforests, volcanic landscapes, hot springs, and stunning waterfalls.

tidbits.title: Rich Biodiversity
tidbits.description: The island is home to diverse flora and fauna, including the endemic Sisserou Parrot and thriving marine life, making it a paradise for nature enthusiasts.

tidbits.title: Resilience and Culture
tidbits.description: Dominica's culture is marked by resilience, seen in traditions like Creole music, vibrant Carnival celebrations, and the warmth of its people.
